long_description: The cooling comfort of the Patagonia Air Flow T-shirt makes running in hot weather much more comfortable. Quick-drying and moisture-wicking polyester mesh fabric offers UPF 15 sun protection. Mesh underarm panels enhance breathability; offset seams reduce chafing. Odor control in fabric helps keep funky scents at bay. Reflective logos on chest and center back enhance visibility. Patagonia Air Flow T-shirt offers a slim fit.
short_description: The cooling comfort of the Patagonia Air Flow T-shirt makes running in hot weather much more comfortable.
